mapper.update: UPDATE t_wh_location_sku_volume SET serial_number = #{serialNumber,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , location_id = #{locationId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , sku_id = #{skuId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , lower_capacity = #{lowerCapacity,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , upper_capacity = #{upperCapacity,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , create_time = #{createTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , last_modify_time = #{lastModifyTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , created_id = #{createdId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , modified_id = #{modifiedId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} WHERE id = #{id} and ou_id = #{ouId} and last_modify_time <= #{lastModifyTime}
mapper.select: select facilityLocSkuVolTemp.*, sku.code as skuCode, sku.name as skuName, sum(IFNULL(skuInv.on_hand_qty,0)) as onHandQty from ( SELECT locationSkuVol.id as id, locationSkuVol.serial_number as serialNumber, IFNULL(locationSkuVol.sku_id,facilityGroSkuVol.sku_id) as skuId, locationSkuVol.location_id as locationId, locationSkuVol.lower_capacity as lowerCapacity, locationSkuVol.upper_capacity as upperCapacity, locationSkuVol.ou_id as ouId, locationSkuVol.create_time as createTime, locationSkuVol.last_modify_time as lastModifyTime, locationSkuVol.created_id as createdId, locationSkuVol.modified_id as modifiedId, location.code as locationCode, location.work_area_id as workAreaId, area.area_code as workAreaCode FROM t_wh_outbound_facility AS facility left join t_wh_facility_location_sku_volume as facilityLocSkuVol on facility.id = facilityLocSkuVol.facility_id left join t_wh_location_sku_volume as locationSkuVol on locationSkuVol.id = facilityLocSkuVol.lsv_id left join t_wh_outbound_facility_group as facilityGroup on facility.facility_group = facilityGroup.id left join t_wh_facility_group_sku_volume as facilityGroSkuVol on facilityGroSkuVol.facility_group_id = facilityGroup.id and locationSkuVol.serial_number = facilityGroSkuVol.serial_number left join t_wh_location as location on locationSkuVol.location_id = location.id left join t_wh_area as area on area.id = location.work_area_id WHERE facility.ou_id = #{ouId} and facility.id = #{facilityId} and facility.facility_type = 'checkTable' ) as facilityLocSkuVolTemp left join t_wh_sku_inventory as skuInv on facilityLocSkuVolTemp.skuId = skuInv.sku_id and facilityLocSkuVolTemp.locationId = skuInv.location_id left join t_wh_sku as sku on facilityLocSkuVolTemp.skuId = sku.id where skuInv.occupation_code is null group by skuInv.location_id,skuInv.sku_id
